about_the_game:
The Pluto Campaign features a planet Pluto and it's moon Charon! Beat those very difficult sectors and beat the boss in the end! Master this campaign and earn campaign stars!

Features:

Two celestial bodies:

Pluto: 2x2 planet

Charon 1x1 celestial body (with a final boss)

Advantages:

  • You no longer have to own steam inventory items (certain planets) to play this campaign! If you own this DLC you can keep it to yourself forever!

  • Instant unlock! No download required

  • Earn a campaign gift from this DLC! (1000 credits, two 2X Multiplier)

  • Master this campaign and show your pride with campaign stars!

  • Support the developer!

Features:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2300 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 (or a GPU with at least 128MB VRAM)
  • Additional Notes: Absolute Minimum Specs on Lowest which should get you around 60FPS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14-24
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Additional Notes: Tested on highest settings without major stuttering or lag

name: Asteroids ++ | Pluto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2300 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 (or a GPU with at least 128MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Absolute Minimum Specs on Lowest which should get you around 60FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on highest settings without major stuttering or lag

short_description: The Pluto Campaign features a planet Pluto and it's moon Charon! Beat those very difficult sectors and beat the boss in the end! Master this campaign and earn campaign stars!
